```{r}
library(here)
library(SummarizedExperiment)
library(SingleCellExperiment)
library(scater)
library(scran)
source(here("R-functions","NAguideR_functions.R"))
```


# All data

```{r}
set.seed(100)
sce <- readRDS(file = here("Analyses","Leduc","Output_batch_effect_removal","logintensities_batch_removed.RDS"))
data <- t(sce)

methods <- c("zero", "minimum", "knnmethod", "qrilc")

for(i in methods){
  if(!file.exists(paste0(here("Analyses/Leduc/Output_batch_effect_removal/"),i, "_batch_removed_sce.RDS"))){
  begin_time <- Sys.time()
  
  df <- nafunctions(x = data, method = i)
  
  end_time <- Sys.time()
  
  time_difference <- end_time - begin_time
  
  saveRDS(object = df, file = paste0(here("Analyses/Leduc/Output_batch_effect_removal/"),i, "_batch_removed_sce.RDS"))
  saveRDS(object = time_difference, file = paste0(here("Analyses/Leduc/Output_batch_effect_removal/"),i, "_batch_removed_time.RDS"))
  }

}


```


```{r}
set.seed(100)

for (j in c(1:10)){
  sce <- readRDS(file = paste0(here("Analyses","Leduc","Output_batch_effect_removal",
                                    paste0("logintensities_batch_removed_MISTOT10_MNAR25_", j, ".RDS"))))
  data <- t(sce[rowMeans(is.na(sce))<1,])


methods <- c("zero", "minimum", "knnmethod", "qrilc")
  
  for(i in methods){
    if(!file.exists(paste0(here("Analyses/Leduc/Output_batch_effect_removal/"),i, "_batch_removed_MISTOT10_MNAR25_", j, ".RDS"))){
      
      df <- nafunctions(x = data, method = i)
      
      saveRDS(object = df, file = paste0(here("Analyses/Leduc/Output_batch_effect_removal/"),i, "_batch_removed_MISTOT10_MNAR25_", j, ".RDS"))
      
    }
  }
}


```
